front.title: Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Signaling Extensions for Evolutive OTNs control

abstract.t: This document is a companion to the Generalized Multi-Protocol LabelSwitching (GMPLS) signaling documents. It describes the technology-specific information needed to extend GMPLS signaling to controlOptical Transport Networks (OTN) based on ITU-T G.709 Amendment 3reccomandation.
